title: LF Gold+ Yasuo Players to Complete the 2 Augment Odyssey Mission
body:
I'm Plat 3 and looking for serious players with voice communications to smash out the 2 augment mission.  

You must 
1) Have a working microphone 
2) Be above Gold 5
3) Be able to play Yasuo 

There will be opportunities to complete the remaining missions should remaining group members need to do so :)

Add me in game @ Tedd

replies.body: Hey I have all of the above, and im stuck on the 2 augs mission. I need help :D
